---
title: "reprex legend title"
output: html_document
---

- I believe I created this reprex because someone had a question on how to change the legend title
```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(ggeasy)

mydat <- iris %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  clean_names()

ggplot(mydat, aes(sepal_length, petal_length, color=species)) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  theme_bw() +
  easy_add_legend_title("NEW LEGEND TITLE")

ggplot(mydat, aes(sepal_length, petal_length, color=species)) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(color = "NEW LEGEND TITLE") 

```
